summary: Veterinary case management system with task tracking and date field improvements
architectural_notes: Task management system with selectable items that flow from 'Select Tasks to Include' to 'Remaining Tasks'
Seven predefined task types for veterinary case workflow
known_issues: Task selection not properly transferring checked items to Remaining Tasks

existing_features.title: Fix the task selection workflow so that items checked under 'Select Tasks to Include' during case creation properly appear in 'Remaining Tasks' on the case card with unchecked checkboxes ready to be completed

Implement task checkboxes with correct default states during case creation: Discharge Notes (checked by default), pDVM Notified (checked by default), Labs (unchecked by default), Histo (unchecked by default), Surgery Report (unchecked by default), Imaging (unchecked by default), Culture (unchecked by default)

Format all date input fields to use month/day/year format (MM/DD/YYYY) and implement auto-advance behavior that automatically moves focus to the next input field when the current date field is completed

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix task selection: items checked in 'Select Tasks to Include' should appear in 'Remaining Tasks' with proper checkboxes
Implement task checkboxes with defaults: Discharge Notes (yes), pDVM Notified (yes), Labs (no), Histo (no), Surgery Report (no), Imaging (no), Culture (no)
Format date fields as month/day/year with auto-advance to next field

projectName: Fix task selection workflow and improve date field formatting
